body.p:
Cincinnati April 4" 1864
To His Exclcy. Gov. Bramlette
Governor of Kentucky

The undersigned, a resident of Hamilton County, Ohio, desires an appointment as Commissioner in Ohio for Kentucky, and begs leave to submit for your consideration the inclosed certificate of various business firms of Cincinnati as to his character and qualifications for the office. Hoping to meet with favor and to be informed as to further steps necessary to appointment, I am

Most Respectfully,
Lyman Harding Jr.
Box 1629 Cincinnati.

Commr of Deeds
Ohio
L. Harding Jr
6th Apl/64
